relics.name: Scrap Plating
relics.description: Gain 3 Block at the start of each combat.
relics.flavorText: Salvaged from a fallen Rustborn. Still warm.

relics.name: Energy Cell
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 additional Energy.
relics.flavorText: Pre-Collapse tech. Still holds a charge after centuries.

relics.name: Medical Kit
relics.description: Heal 5 HP after each combat.
relics.flavorText: Standard issue. Most of the supplies are expired.

relics.name: Rust Charm
relics.description: Rustborn enemies deal 1 less damage.
relics.flavorText: A trinket blessed by a Rust Prophet. They'd kill to get it back.

relics.name: Cracked Lens
relics.description: See enemy intents 1 turn in advance.
relics.flavorText: The crack reveals more than the whole ever did.

relics.name: Lucky Coin
relics.description: Gain 10% more credits from all sources.
relics.flavorText: From an old gambling den. The previous owner's luck ran out.

relics.name: Worn Boots
relics.description: The first card you play each turn costs 1 less.
relics.flavorText: Built for long marches. The original owner didn't make it.

relics.name: Data Chip
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 extra card in hand.
relics.flavorText: Contains combat subroutines. Partially corrupted.

relics.name: Adrenaline Injector
relics.description: The first Attack you play each combat deals +3 damage.
relics.flavorText: One shot per fight. Make it count.

relics.name: Makeshift Armor
relics.description: Gain 1 Armor at the start of each combat.
relics.flavorText: Scrap welded to scrap. Better than nothing.

relics.name: Corrupted Shard
relics.description: Deal +2 damage, but gain 1 Corruption after each combat.
relics.flavorText: It whispers. You try not to listen.

relics.name: Water Flask
relics.description: Heal 2 HP at the start of each combat.
relics.flavorText: Clean water is worth more than gold on Vharos.

relics.name: Signal Flare
relics.description: Once per combat, draw 2 cards when HP drops below 50%.
relics.flavorText: Emergency beacon. Now repurposed for survival.

relics.name: Targeting Module
relics.description: Attacks against Vulnerable enemies deal +2 damage.
relics.flavorText: Exploit weakness. It's the Vharos way.

relics.name: Echo Stone
relics.description: The first card you discard each turn is shuffled back into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Time loops in miniature. Useful, if unsettling.

relics.name: Venom Vial
relics.description: Apply 1 Poison whenever you apply a debuff.
relics.flavorText: Extracted from Thicket creatures. Handle with care.

relics.name: Prayer Beads
relics.description: First Light Remnant vendors offer 15% discounts.
relics.flavorText: Old faith, old symbols. Still respected in some places.

relics.name: Shock Absorber
relics.description: Reduce damage from the first attack each combat by 3.
relics.flavorText: Industrial damper. Keeps the worst hits manageable.

relics.name: Salvage Kit
relics.description: Gain 5 credits whenever you Exhaust a card.
relics.flavorText: One person's trash, another's trade goods.

relics.name: Void Fragment
relics.description: Cards that cost 0 deal +3 damage.
relics.flavorText: A sliver of nothing. Somehow, it hurts.

relics.name: Void Shard
relics.description: +1 Energy each turn, but gain 3 Corruption at the end of each combat.
relics.flavorText: Power from the void. The cost comes later.

relics.name: Ancient Core
relics.description: Draw 1 extra card each turn.
relics.flavorText: Architect technology. Still functional after eons.

relics.name: Rage Crystal
relics.description: Gain 1 Strength whenever you take damage.
relics.flavorText: Pain becomes power. A dangerous exchange.

relics.name: Temporal Anchor
relics.description: Retain 1 card at the end of each turn.
relics.flavorText: Holds moments in place. Lyria would understand.

relics.name: Astral Prism
relics.description: Your multi-hit attacks deal +1 damage per hit.
relics.flavorText: Splits damage into fractals. Each one cuts.

relics.name: Blood Vial
relics.description: Heal 3 HP whenever you kill an enemy.
relics.flavorText: Not quite vampire tech. Close enough.

relics.name: Stealth Cloak
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain Invisible for 1 turn.
relics.flavorText: Standard Faceless equipment. Where did you get this?

relics.name: Thermal Regulator
relics.description: Overheat threshold increased by 5. Start combat with 2 Overheat.
relics.flavorText: Korvax's original regulator. Barely functional, deeply personal.

relics.name: Astral Conduit
relics.description: Whenever you Scry, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: Lyria's focus. The future flows through it.

relics.name: Radiant Medallion
relics.description: First Light abilities deal +3 damage. Gain 1 Corruption per combat.
relics.flavorText: The Light burns brighter near the void.

relics.name: Toxic Blade
relics.description: Attacks apply 2 Poison.
relics.flavorText: Thicket-forged. The venom never stops working.

relics.name: Protective Ward
relics.description: Block is 25% more effective.
relics.flavorText: Old barrier technology. The wards still hold.

relics.name: Merchant's Seal
relics.description: All items in shops cost 20% less.
relics.flavorText: Trade guild membership. Still honored by survivors.

relics.name: Combat Stimulant
relics.description: Once per combat, gain 2 Energy when HP drops below 30%.
relics.flavorText: Fight or flight. This ensures fight.

relics.name: Void Eye
relics.description: At 50%+ Corruption, draw 1 extra card per turn.
relics.flavorText: The deeper you fall, the more you see.

relics.name: Resonance Crystal
relics.description: Power cards cost 1 less.
relics.flavorText: Amplifies permanent effects. Handle carefully.

relics.name: Titan Scale
relics.description: Gain 2 Armor. Cannot be removed.
relics.flavorText: A scale from something ancient. Something that shouldn't exist.

relics.name: Refractor Lens
relics.description: Attacks deal +1 damage for each buff you have.
relics.flavorText: Focuses your advantages into pure force.

relics.name: Echo Amplifier
relics.description: Whenever you play 3 cards in a turn, draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: Actions echo through time. This catches them.

relics.name: Corrupted Heart
relics.description: Heal 1 HP whenever you gain Corruption.
relics.flavorText: The void sustains as it consumes.

relics.name: Shard of First Light
relics.description: Radiance deals 50% more damage. Start combat with 2 Radiance on all enemies.
relics.flavorText: Auren's shattered faith, made manifest.

relics.name: Mask of Echoes
relics.description: Copy the first enemy ability each combat. Gain Invisible after playing a copied ability.
relics.flavorText: Shade's only possession. They don't remember finding it.

relics.name: Architect's Compass
relics.description: See all paths on the map. ? nodes reveal their contents.
relics.flavorText: They mapped everything. Even the things that shouldn't exist.

relics.name: Temporal Shard
relics.description: Once per combat, return to the start of the previous turn.
relics.flavorText: A frozen moment. Use it wisely.

relics.name: Reality Stabilizer
relics.description: Corruption gain is reduced by 50%.
relics.flavorText: A piece of what held the seals together. Still working.

relics.name: Void Heart
relics.description: +2 Energy per turn. Gain 5 Corruption per combat. Cannot be unequipped.
relics.flavorText: Power beyond measure. The price is your soul.

relics.name: Chrono Accelerator
relics.description: Gain 1 Energy the first time you play 5 cards in a turn.
relics.flavorText: Time compression tech. Dangerously unstable.

relics.name: Lifedrinker
relics.description: Heal 1 HP for every 5 damage dealt.
relics.flavorText: Vampiric technology. The Hollow Covenant perfected it.

relics.name: Overcharge Capacitor
relics.description: Whenever you gain Energy, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: Excess power has to go somewhere.

relics.name: Soul Cage
relics.description: When you would die, survive with 1 HP and gain 30 Block. Once per run.
relics.flavorText: Traps the moment of death. Buys you time.

relics.name: Whisper Blade
relics.description: Deal +5 damage to enemies with debuffs.
relics.flavorText: Faceless assassin's tool. Strikes the weak points.

relics.name: Herald Fragment
relics.description: Deal +50% damage to Herald enemies. Take +25% damage from Heralds.
relics.flavorText: Part of a Herald's essence. They want it back.

relics.name: Null Stone
relics.description: Immune to the first debuff applied each combat.
relics.flavorText: Absolute negation. Once per fight.

relics.name: Perfect Form
relics.description: Cards cannot be exhausted unless they say Exhaust.
relics.flavorText: Preserve everything. Lose nothing.

relics.name: Fragment of the Matter Seal
relics.description: Gain 5 Armor permanently. All damage you take is reduced by 2.
relics.flavorText: The Rust Titan's prison, shattered. This piece remembers solidity.

relics.name: Fragment of the Time Seal
relics.description: At the start of Act 3, you may restart the run with your current deck.
relics.flavorText: The Witness's burden, broken. This piece remembers beginnings.

relics.name: Fragment of the Light Seal
relics.description: Corruption can never exceed 75%. Gain 15 Corruption now.
relics.flavorText: The Seraph's sacrifice, undone. This piece remembers meaning.

relics.name: Fragment of the Identity Seal
relics.description: Once per combat, become a copy of the current enemy for 2 turns (gain their abilities).
relics.flavorText: The Whisper King's mask, cracked. This piece remembers selfhood.

relics.name: Xal'Korath's Eye
relics.description: Your Corruption level grants +1% damage per point. Corruption cannot be reduced.
relics.flavorText: The World-Eater sees through you now. You see through it.

relics.name: Architect's Codex
relics.description: Start each combat with a random Rare card in hand. All card rewards offer +1 choice.
relics.flavorText: The complete knowledge of a dead civilization. Heavy reading.
